name: Yuke's SmackDown vs. Raw Animation
summary: Learn about .YMKS files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: In 2004, the WWE SmackDown series became the WWE SmackDown vs. Raw series. Games in this series, up to WWE SmackDown vs. Raw 2011, use animations saved as YMKS files. WWE Legends of Wrestlemania also uses YMKS animations.
NOTE: Later Yuke's WWE games use .YANM and .ACTS animations.

instructions: YMKS files are not meant to be opened. WWE SmackDown vs. Raw games load and use YMKS files to show in-game animations.
You can use SVR Anim Editor (Windows) to convert YMKS files to the .ANIM format.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
